reason: To understand their strategy for mitigating the city-wide loan payment failures and to explore how the Arte dei Banchieri can contribute to a financial stability stratagem for the Republic.
message_to_consiglio: Consiglio, these loan failures are a real headache for everyone, and my dock business is feeling the pinch too. I've been thinking about a way for us bankers to get ahead of this mess, maybe a new plan to steady the ship.
